page.title: DeFi on Aptos
page.description: Comprehensive directory of DeFi protocols on the Aptos blockchain

search.no_results: No protocols found matching your criteria.

Credit.name: Credit
Credit.description: Protocols that facilitate borrowing, lending, and credit-based services

Lending.name: Lending
Lending.description: Platforms where users can lend and borrow crypto assets with interest rates

RWA Lending.description: Lending protocols backed by real-world assets like real estate or commodities

NFT Lending.name: NFT Lending
NFT Lending.description: Borrow money using NFTs as collateral or lend to NFT holders

Uncollateralized Lending.name: Uncollateralized Lending
Uncollateralized Lending.description: Loans without collateral, based on reputation or credit scoring

CDP.name: CDP
CDP.description: Collateralized Debt Positions - Create stablecoins by locking collateral in smart contracts

Yield.name: Yield
Yield.description: Protocols focused on staking, yield generation, and reward distribution

Liquid Staking.name: Liquid Staking
Liquid Staking.description: Stake tokens while receiving tradeable receipts to maintain liquidity

Restaking.name: Restaking
Restaking.description: Use already staked tokens to secure additional protocols for extra rewards

Liquid Restaking.name: Liquid Restaking
Liquid Restaking.description: Restaking with liquid tokens that can be traded or used in DeFi

Liquidity Manager.name: Liquidity Manager
Liquidity Manager.description: Tools or protocols that optimize and rebalance liquidity across pools

Leveraged Farming.name: Leveraged Farming
Leveraged Farming.description: Borrow funds to increase liquidity provision and amplify farming rewards

Yield Aggregator.name: Yield Aggregator
Yield Aggregator.description: Automatically find and switch between the best yield opportunities

Trading.name: Trading
Trading.description: Protocols for trading, market making, and liquidity provision

DEX.name: DEX
DEX.description: Decentralized exchanges for swapping tokens without intermediaries

DEX Aggregator.name: DEX Agg.
DEX Aggregator.description: Find the best prices across multiple DEXes for optimal trades

Perps.name: Perps
Perps.description: Trade perpetual futures contracts with leverage on crypto assets

Options.name: Options
Options.description: Buy and sell options contracts to hedge or speculate on price movements

Prediction Market.name: Prediction Market
Prediction Market.description: Bet on real-world events and outcomes using crypto

Launchpad.name: Launchpad
Launchpad.description: Launch new tokens with fair distribution and community features

Multiple.name: Multiple
Multiple.description: Protocols offering multiple DeFi products across different categories

protocol_descriptions.Panora: A "meta-DEX" that plugs into an on-chain order-book and 10+ AMMs, splitting orders across pools while curating a canonical token list that auto-updates in its UI.
protocol_descriptions.Kana: Routes swaps across nine chains; a Paymaster contract lets users trade on Aptos without holding APT for gas; an orderbook-based perp engine.
protocol_descriptions.Thetis: Thetis bundles a spot aggregator, 50× perpetuals, and liquidity-bootstrapping pools (LBPs) under one roof.
protocol_descriptions.Anqa: Claims 99% liquidity coverage across 15+ Aptos DEXes; real-time sampling previews slippage before you sign and lets you batch multi-token swaps to save gas.
protocol_descriptions.LiquidSwap: Pontem's flagship AMM and the first DEX live on Aptos mainnet; offers classic Uniswap-V2 pools, a stable-swap curve, and a formally-verified concentrated-liquidity design.
protocol_descriptions.Cellana: A ve(3,3) AMM where veNFT voters direct emissions and capture 100% of fees.
protocol_descriptions.PancakeSwap: Binance's flagship DEX cloned its V2 AMM onto Move and bridged some CAKE liquidity to Aptos.
protocol_descriptions.SushiSwap: Sushi executed its first non-EVM integration, enabling cross-chain routes that settle on Aptos while preserving the familiar Trident router UX.
protocol_descriptions.Hyperion: A fully on-chain hybrid Order-book + CL-AMM that leverages Aptos' throughput for HFT-style trading.
protocol_descriptions.Tapp: The first hook-enabled, Uniswap V4-style modular DEX on Aptos testnet; smart-contract hooks let builders compose custom pools while users get programmable swaps.
protocol_descriptions.Merkle: A gamified perp DEX with XP, loot-boxes, and 150× leverage; more than $20b of total volume.
protocol_descriptions.AGDEX: Offers 1-100× cross-margin perps with low-impact oracle fills keep slippage tight for retail traders.
protocol_descriptions.Pump: Anyone can mint meme tokens via bonding curves; every coin is fair-launched with no presale or team allocation.
protocol_descriptions.Aries: The first Compound-style money market on Aptos, upgraded with 90%-LTV E-Mode, integrated bridging, and spot trading in one interface.
protocol_descriptions.Superposition: Advanced risk management platform inspired by Bank of England's FHS VaR, offering leveraged yield opportunities with real-time risk monitoring and dynamic collateral factor adjustment.
protocol_descriptions.Joule: Combines isolated lending pools with "Liquidity Anchors" for leveraged farming.
protocol_descriptions.Echelon: A lending hub that supports both E-Mode and isolated markets.
protocol_descriptions.Meso: Capital-efficient lending with user-configured debt ceilings and a Safety Module that backstops protocol shortfalls.
protocol_descriptions.TruFin: Enterprise-grade liquid staking; users receive TruAPT in exchange for staking APT.
protocol_descriptions.Amnis: Dual-token system issues stAPT (yield-bearing) and amAPT (stable), letting users toggle between yield and stability while routing validator commission back to stakers.
protocol_descriptions.Kofi: MEV-boosted liquid staking with leveraged-LSD vaults.
protocol_descriptions.Ichi: Automated Liquidity Manager vaults let projects seed single-sided liquidity; smart ranges rebalance to cut impermanent loss while treasuries earn swap fees in their native token.
protocol_descriptions.Moar: Building leveraged-farm layer with cross-protocol credit accounts enabling users to borrow in one place and deploy in another.
protocol_descriptions.Thala: A suite of DeFi apps featuring a multi-pool AMM, the over-collateralized MOD stablecoin, and liquid-staking via sthAPT and thAPT.
protocol_descriptions.GoblinFinance: APTOS FIRST active liquidity management strategy layer for Uniswap V3-style & Perp DEXs. Built on Aptos' Global Trading Engine for lightning-fast, scalable DeFi, making sophisticated LP & delta-neutral strategies EASY for all.
